item.title: [DeltaScape] Teleporting help. -- Need someone who ACTUALLY knows coding
item.dc:creator: @adamhelloman8 adamhelloman8
item.description:
@adamhelloman8 wrote:

Yes, you have to find the button id of the teleport.

Before I start, make sure your ingame name is set up with the println

so search for

println("ab=

above it, make sure it says

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURINGAMENAME")){

Ok, now. if you’re using the first teleport, varrock, it is case 4140:

Underneath case 4140: you have to add the interface text. so it will look like this.

c.sendQuest("option1", 15240); // TOP LEFT c.sendQuest("option2", 15241); // TOP RIGHT c.sendQuest("option3", 15239); // MIDDLE c.sendQuest("option4", 15243); // BOTTOM LEFT c.sendQuest("option5", 15242); // BOTTOM RIGHT c.setSidebarInterface(6, 3209); c.interfaceGame = 4; break;

Change the options to the text.

Now, to get the orbs to teleport to where you want to go,

you have to find the button id of the orbs.

When you click the orb, in your command prompt it should say something like ab = ####, except the #'s are numbers.

Once it give’s you those, in clickingmost, search for the number it gives you, than make it look like this.

case BUTTONID: c.triggerTele(XCOORD, YCOORD, HEIGHT[keep it 0]; break;

for example.

case 4345: c.triggerTele(2755, 2784, 0); break;

Now, you have to do that for all orbs, and than you’re finished.

Ps. There’s a tut for this.

Read full topic
item.source: [DeltaScape] Teleporting help. -- Need someone who ACTUALLY knows coding

item.title: [DeltaScape] Teleporting help. -- Need someone who ACTUALLY knows coding
item.dc:creator: @M_A_R_T_Y M A R T Y
item.description:
@M_A_R_T_Y wrote:

Get the clicking cases and go to clickingMost.java and be like
case ##:
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
break;

I think when you click on them it’ll show the actionbutton in run.bat to find out the cases.
Good luck.

Read full topic
item.source: [DeltaScape] Teleporting help. -- Need someone who ACTUALLY knows coding

item.title: [DeltaScape] Teleporting help. -- Need someone who ACTUALLY knows coding
item.dc:creator: @N11 -N-
item.description:
@N11 wrote:

How can I make this –

case 73136: case 4143: case 50245: // edgeville teleport c.teleEffect = 1; c.sendQuest("Which teleport?", 2470); c.sendQuest("Edgeville", 2471); c.sendQuest("Varrock", 2472); c.sendQuest("Mage bank", 2473); c.sendFrame164(2469); break;

Be a teleport with orbs, like with the “Minigame Tele.”

Also needing to add –

Staff Zone

X: 1864, Y: 5347

Falador

X: 2695, Y: 3384

If you need and example of an orb teleport –

case 73116: case 6005: // training teleport c.sendQuest("Barrows", 15240); c.sendQuest("Fight Pits", 15241); c.sendQuest("Pest Control", 15239); c.sendQuest("Assault", 15243); c.sendQuest("", 15242); c.setSidebarInterface(6, 3209); // magic tab (ancient = 12855) c.interfaceGame = 2; break;

Read full topic
